[SOC][USER]Good morning , sir . Is there a bank near here ? [dialog_acts]question[SYSTEM] There is one . 5 blocks away from here ? [dialog_acts]inform[USER] Well , that's too far.Can you change some money for me ? [dialog_acts]directive[EOC][SOR][SYSTEM] Surely , of course . What kind of currency have you got ? [EOR]

[SOC][USER]Good afternoon . This is Michelle Li speaking , calling on behalf of IBA . Is Mr Meng available at all ? [dialog_acts]question[SYSTEM] This is Mr Meng speaking , Michelle . [dialog_acts]inform[USER] Oh , hello ! Sorry about that . I'm just calling to say that we've received your new Corporate Credit Card from HQ . [dialog_acts]inform[EOC][SOR][SYSTEM] That was quick ! I wasn't expecting it until later this week . [EOR]

[SOC][USER] Oh , hello ! Sorry about that . I'm just calling to say that we've received your new Corporate Credit Card from HQ . [dialog_acts]inform[SYSTEM] That was quick ! I wasn't expecting it until later this week . [dialog_acts]inform[USER] Yes , our application procedures have speeded up since we started using the new fast-track system . [dialog_acts]inform[EOC][SOR][SYSTEM] Shall I come in and collect it ? [EOR]

[dialog_acts]directive[EOC][SOR][SYSTEM] Mmmm ... if I come in and collect it this afternoon , is there any way I could use it today ? Petty cash is getting low , so I need to draw some money . [EOR]

[SOC][USER] Or we can send it to you . But if you would like to use it at the ATM , you'll need to wait for your PIN number . [dialog_acts]directive[SYSTEM] Mmmm ... if I come in and collect it this afternoon , is there any way I could use it today ? Petty cash is getting low , so I need to draw some money . [dialog_acts]question[USER] As long as you bring your ID , etc , we can serve you over the counter . But you won't be able to use the ATM until your new PIN number arrives . [dialog_acts]directive[EOC][SOR][SYSTEM] I see . Yes , that's fine . I'll be there at around 2:30 pm . See you later , and thanks . [EOR]

[SOC][USER]What qualifications should a reporter have ? [dialog_acts]question[SYSTEM] As a reporter , he must have acute insight and language skills . At the same time , he must have good judgment , the respect for his job and tactical cooperation with others . [dialog_acts]inform[USER] Can you work under pressure ? You know , people working here are all busy everyday since we're daily newspaper . [dialog_acts]question[EOC][SOR][SYSTEM] I think I've got used to work under pressure . I will adjust myself to the step of your newspaper quickly . [EOR]

[SOC][USER]I can't believe you wear jeans to the office ! Are you trying to lose your job ? [dialog_acts]question[SYSTEM] Of course not . I'm just observing casual day . On Fridays , the company doesn't require us to wear formal business attire . [dialog_acts]inform[USER] Wow ! Nobody told me about that . Won't the relaxed dress code damage the company image ? [dialog_acts]question[EOC][SOR][SYSTEM] We don't think so . Casual days are becoming more common , and we believe employees can maintain a professional image without wearing uncomfortable clothes . [EOR]

[SOC][USER] Wow ! Nobody told me about that . Won't the relaxed dress code damage the company image ? [dialog_acts]question[SYSTEM] We don't think so . Casual days are becoming more common , and we believe employees can maintain a professional image without wearing uncomfortable clothes . [dialog_acts]inform[EOC][SOR][SYSTEM] Believe it or not , it has the opposite effect . Employees are actually more productive on casual days . [EOR]

[SOC][USER]ABC Company , my name is Lucy . How can I help you ? [dialog_acts]question[SYSTEM] Hello , Lucy , this is Monica . I ’ m calling for the accountant position . I saw the information about the vacancy on your company ’ s website . Is it still available ? [dialog_acts]question[USER] Thank you for your interest . The position is still available . Have you already sent your CV to us ? [dialog_acts]question[EOC][SOR][SYSTEM] No , not yet . First , I want to check about the availability and see if you could give more information . [EOR]

[SOC][USER] Thank you for your interest . The position is still available . Have you already sent your CV to us ? [dialog_acts]question[SYSTEM] No , not yet . First , I want to check about the availability and see if you could give more information . [dialog_acts]directive[USER] It is urgent for us to fill this position now and I would like to stress that English is a must because of the international contacts and most likely traveling abroad very soon . If all these is not problem for you , I recommend you to mention these in your cover letter and send it to me directly .
